'''Blades Won't Do''' is a [[Badges|badge]] that can be obtained by playing the mission [[Toya's Perfection (Ch. 2)]] on the island of [[Calamity Reef]].

Objective: <big style="color:yellow">Always kill Sam Bellamy with a firearm.</big>
